data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Toa Baja will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Toa Baja, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Toa Baja, Puerto Rico.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Toa Baja hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 74,300 people living in Toa Baja through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Levittown
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Levittown, Toa Baja, Puerto Rico.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 24,157 believers in Toa Baja, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Toa Baja, Puerto Rico a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary:
the state of Toa Baja, Puerto Rico has a population of 74,300.

We estimate Toa Baja has 24,157 people who might know Jesus, 46,092 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,051 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Toa Baja prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.
